content.title: Our Journey
content.description: Start Solo Blueprint was founded with a simple mission: to help aspiring entrepreneurs build profitable solo businesses without the burnout that often comes with it.

highlights.title: The Beginning
highlights.description: Founded during the pandemic to help professionals transition to sustainable solo businesses

highlights.title: Growing Community
highlights.description: Expanded to serve 1000+ solopreneurs across India

highlights.title: Blueprint Development
highlights.description: Launched our signature framework after studying 500+ successful solo businesses

highlights.title: Scaling Impact
highlights.description: Reached 2,800+ successful graduates and launched our WhatsApp community

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower 100,000 professionals to build profitable solo businesses that provide both financial freedom and work-life balance by 2030.
keyPoints: Eliminate the overwhelm from starting a business
Create a supportive community of solopreneurs

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where anyone can build a successful business without sacrificing their wellbeing.

pillars.title: Freedom
pillars.description: Financial and time freedom to live life on your terms

pillars.title: Impact
pillars.description: Making a meaningful difference in your clients' lives

pillars.title: Balance
pillars.description: Growing your business without burning out

content.title: The Start Solo Blueprint Way
content.description: Our approach combines proven business principles with modern strategies and tools, designed specifically for solo entrepreneurs.

principles.title: Simplicity First
principles.description: We believe in cutting through the noise and focusing on what actually works

principles.title: Action-Oriented
principles.description: Every concept comes with clear, implementable steps

principles.title: Community-Driven
principles.description: Learning and growing together with like-minded solopreneurs

principles.title: Results-Focused
principles.description: Everything we teach is tested and proven to work

content.title: Meet the Experts Behind Start Solo
content.description: Our team combines decades of experience in business, technology, and entrepreneurship.

members.name: Diksha Sethi
members.bio: Communications specialist with 18+ years of experience leading brands like Mastercard, Ford, and Qualcomm.

members.name: Rahul Mehta
members.bio: Former management consultant with expertise in scaling businesses and operational efficiency.

joinTeam.title: Join Our Team
joinTeam.description: We're always looking for passionate people to join our mission.

content.title: What We Stand For
content.description: Our values guide everything we do, from course creation to community management.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: We're honest about what works and what doesn't

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We maintain high standards in everything we deliver

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We constantly evolve our methods based on real results

values.title: Community
values.description: We believe in the power of learning and growing together

content.title: Get in Touch
content.description: Have questions about our programs or want to learn more? We're here to help.
